channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 08:37 Attack drones
item.description: 🟠 08:37 Attack drones This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 08:37 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
